original_title: 投稿されてきた！呪いの心霊映像
overview: The first in a series that introduces the psychic phenomena that have been introduced into home videos, etc. posted by the general public. Includes eight posted videos, including the horrifying spirit "Video Message" that was transferred to the message video scheduled to be played at the wedding, and the psychic phenomenon "Jun-chan's Room" that occurred on the video cameras of the young people who went on an expedition to the ruins.
title: Toukou Sarete Kita Noroi no Shinrei Eizou
